interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Butecare Eyelash Growth Enhancer & Brow Serum for Long - Amazon Vine
Review Date: 2018/11/01
Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.5 x 0.9 x 0.9 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
Review Text: Didn't work at all for me. Plus I was really worried about what would happen if it got into my eyes. They made it clear to NOT get it on your eyelids because it doesn't need to go into your eyes. That worries me because I know no matter how careful I am there's probably going to some that will drip down into my eye. Anything that's going on or around my eyes shouldn't be toxic. And maybe they only say that as a precaution and it wouldn't hurt your eye but I don't like to take chances with my eyes.
Review Title: No luck for me
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Optic Shop Pro-Moisture Chamber With Elastic Head Band - Size Small
Optic Shop
['Small PRO-MOISTURE CHAMBER WITH ELASTIC HEAD BAND - White Foam. One Elastic Chamber. Ideal for dry-eye conditions. Clear vinyl shield with soft sponge edging that gently hugs facial contours. Product dimensions: 40mm vertical, 60mm Horizontal. Combat miserable dry eye conditions with the Pro-Moisture Chamber with Elastic Head Band from Optic Shop. Clear vinyl shielding offers ideal eye protection. Inner lining of soft sponge material hugs the contours of the face and provides hours of comfortable wear. Comes with comfortable elastic head band, and fits both the left and right eyes. Size Small and package quantity of 1.']
{'Color': 'White', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Fabric Type': 'Foam', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.2 x 2.36 x 1.57 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': '144SB', 'Date First Available': 'May 20, 2015', 'Manufacturer': 'Optic Shop'}
I bought this when I had a bout of bells palsy and I wish I wouldn't have wasted the money. I didn't really use it even though it was a great idea it was just uncomfortable and kept fogging up. The foam around it is rough and hurt the soft skin around my eye. The strap I found to be fine once I tied it off to fit me. I still have it and if I ever have another bout of BP I might glue or somehow put some soft fabric around it. Won't fix the fogging up but it might make it feel a little more comfortable. Don't have anything to lose. I wouldn't wear it like it is.
Great idea....
Butecare Eyelash Growth Enhancer & Brow Serum for Long - Amazon Vine
{'Package Dimensions': '4.5 x 0.9 x 0.9 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
Didn't work at all for me. Plus I was really worried about what would happen if it got into my eyes. They made it clear to NOT get it on your eyelids because it doesn't need to go into your eyes. That worries me because I know no matter how careful I am there's probably going to some that will drip down into my eye. Anything that's going on or around my eyes shouldn't be toxic. And maybe they only say that as a precaution and it wouldn't hurt your eye but I don't like to take chances with my eyes.
No luck for me
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Health Focus:** The user has a keen interest in products that address specific health conditions, particularly dry-eye issues, with an emphasis on safety and effectiveness for eye-related products. 
- **Comfort Preference:** Strong emphasis on comfort; has consistently expressed discomfort regarding product materials and fit, particularly with items used around the eyes.
- **Critical Evaluation:** The user critically evaluates product effectiveness based on personal experiences, adopting a pragmatic approach to purchases. Recent interactions indicate strong skepticism, particularly concerning safety concerns related to eye health products.
- **Functional Utility Over Aesthetics:** Values functionality in products but remains open to modifications for enhanced comfort, indicating a hands-on attitude toward improving user experience.
- **Past Negative Experience:** Previous negative encounters with health-related products contribute to a heightened skepticism about equivalent future purchases, emphasizing a cautious mindset towards new eye products.
- **Adaptability & Safety Concerns:** Willing to customize products to improve comfort while prioritizing safety, demonstrated by worries about product ingredients and their effects should they get into the eyes, indicating a proactive approach to health and safety.

Overall, the user prioritizes health, safety, and comfort in product selection, exhibiting a critical, cautious, and adaptive approach to their personal needs, especially concerning products used around the eyes.
